The Item Berrytale

There’s something magical about the bread at this bakery. It’s so soft and delicious. So when you fill it with blueberry cream cheese and a dollop of blueberry jam, you’ve got yourself a winner.

The Place 85ºC Bakery Cafe $

35201 Newark Blvd
Newark, CA 94560
